description: This script determines whether a specific feature (LSA) is enabled based on various configuration sources such as ini files and the existence of a particular file. It includes functions to log messages and check feature status by sourcing external scripts.

methods.name: ifeLogging
methods.description: Logs messages with a timestamp to a specified log file.

methods.name: isFeatureEnabled
methods.description: Checks if a given feature is enabled by reading configuration files and environment variables.
